article.title: Webpack全家桶
article.body:
## 新的打包工具
* [Parcel](https://github.com/parcel-bundler/parcel)

## 社区
* [webpack中文](https://doc.webpack-china.org/concepts/)

## 书籍
* [《深入浅出 Webpack》](http://webpack.wuhaolin.cn/)

## 文章
* [关键CSS和Webpack: 减少阻塞渲染的CSS的自动化解决方案](http://www.dwz.cn/6FukBd)
* [使用 webpack 优化资源](https://juejin.im/entry/59e75f506fb9a0450d102de1)
* [webpack配置之后端渲染](https://juejin.im/post/59f156c75188250989514eb8)
* [webpack3--plugins大用处](https://juejin.im/post/59f14b16f265da432a7acd73)
* [Webpack经典入门](https://juejin.im/post/59f93357f265da43305dc90a)
* [使用 webpack 优化资源](https://qiutc.me/post/resource-optimization-webpack.html)
* [妈妈再也不用担心我不会webpack了](https://juejin.im/post/5a068c2b5188255851322b8c)
* [Webpack自动化构建实践指南](https://juejin.im/post/5a3700a45188252582277880)(使用webpack构建项目时必读)
* [webpack 为什么这么难用？](https://juejin.im/post/5a2ff0b2f265da433562bce4)
* [Webpack引入jquery及其插件的几种方法](http://blog.csdn.net/yiifaa/article/details/51916560)
* [Webpack优化-缩小文件搜索范围](https://juejin.im/post/5a4054656fb9a0452207ba8e)
* [《深入浅出Webpack》](http://webpack.wuhaolin.cn/)
* [看清楚真正的 Webpack 插件](https://juejin.im/entry/5a4cb7906fb9a04500037399)
* [你的Tree-Shaking并没什么卵用](https://juejin.im/post/5a5652d8f265da3e497ff3de)
* [从搭建vue-脚手架到掌握webpack配置（三.多页面构建）](https://juejin.im/post/5a5cb391f265da3e317e2579)
* [webpack4-用之初体验，一起敲它十一遍](https://juejin.im/post/5adea0106fb9a07a9d6ff6de)
* [webpack4基础](https://juejin.im/post/5af8fa806fb9a07ac162876d)
* [webpack4升级完全指南](https://segmentfault.com/a/1190000014247030)
